name: The Caffeinship
description:
This was the entry made for the Global Game Jam 2016 in Milan, Italy, more info here.

This game is about an intern who has to prepare a coffee for his boss. It's a competitive local multiplayer game, in which a player is the boss, who chooses his preferences about his coffee and he gives hints to the intern who has to logically find the correct ritual to make it, avoiding being fired at the end of the week.
